title: New Customer Acquisition - Student Discount
description: A student wants to sign up for a new plan and apply a student discount.

tasks.description: Explain the student discount program and its verification requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the need for a valid student ID or email.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the online student verification portal (e.g., UNiDAYS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct link and instructions.

tasks.description: Once verified, create the new account and apply the student discount promotion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the account with the discount applied.
